title: Fix hero banner background image text interference on Home page

requirements.text: On the Home page hero banner, replace or modify the background image so it no longer contains visible embedded text. Either generate a clean background image without any text, or apply a strong dark overlay (e.g., semi-transparent dark navy layer at 60â€“75% opacity) over the existing hero background so that any embedded text in the image is fully obscured and does not interfere with the hero banner's headline, subheadline, or CTA button text.

quotes: on the home page the background image contains text that is interfiering, with actuall text

acceptanceCriteria: The hero banner background image contains no visible text that overlaps or competes with the hero section's headline, subheadline, or CTA button.
The hero banner's actual text (headline, subheadline, CTA) is clearly legible against the background.
If an overlay approach is used, the overlay is dark enough (at minimum semi-transparent dark navy) to fully suppress any image-embedded text.
The hero section remains visually appealing and consistent with the dark navy/neon electronics theme.

constraints: Do not alter any file listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
Maintain the existing dark navy/neon electronics visual theme.
nonGoals: Changing the layout or content of any other Home page section.
Modifying the hero banner's text content, CTA links, or animations.
Altering any page other than the Home page.

required: Clean dark navy electronics-themed hero banner background with abstract circuit board or glowing tech bokeh elements, no text or typography (hero-bg.dim_1920x700.png)
